long_description: The comfortable and adjustable Garmin VIRB head strap mount secures your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your head or over a hat so you can capture your entire adventure with hands-free ease. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: The comfortable and adjustable Garmin VIRB head strap mount secures your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your head or over a hat so you can capture your entire adventure with hands-free ease.
